task: Design, implement, and oversee an advanced eco-research conference focusing on the integration of renewable energy technologies in urban planning, ensuring the following conditions: 1. Select a high-tech venue equipped with sustainable energy solutions and capacity for 200 international delegates. 2. Facilitate a smart transportation system, including autonomous electric shuttles and cyclist support. 3. Arrange a five-day program with keynote speeches, interactive panels, and field visits to local green tech sites. 4. Cater using a zero-waste policy with an emphasis on plant-based cuisine. 5. Deploy a real-time digital dashboard tracking energy consumption and waste metrics. 6. Compile a comprehensive sustainability impact report. 7. Navigate sponsorship deals to co-fund the event while maintaining a total budget of $50,000.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Central agent coordinating the eco-research conference, managing communications, and delegating tasks to specialized agents for successful event execution.

agents.name: venue_management_agent
agents.role: Responsible for selecting and managing high-tech, sustainable venues with eco-certifications and advanced energy solutions.

agents.name: transportation_system_agent
agents.role: Designs a smart transportation system focusing on autonomous vehicles and cyclist support for sustainable transit solutions.

agents.name: program_design_agent
agents.role: Plans and organizes conference programs, including keynotes, interactive panels, and site visits to local green technology hubs.

agents.name: catering_service_agent
agents.role: Manages catering needs adhering to a zero-waste policy with an emphasis on plant-based options.

agents.name: digital_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Implements a digital system to monitor energy consumption and waste, providing real-time analytics and reporting.

agents.name: sponsorship_management_agent
agents.role: Secures sponsorship deals and ensures budget alignment with sustainability goals.

agents.name: high_tech_venue_coordination_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with venues to ensure tech facilities meet sustainability and energy efficiency requirements.

agents.name: autonomous_shuttle_agent
agents.role: Organizes autonomous shuttle services and logistics for conference attendees.

agents.name: keynote_speaker_engagement_agent
agents.role: Engages with and coordinates keynote speakers from industry and academia.

agents.name: zero_waste_policy_agent
agents.role: Ensures all catering and conference practices adhere to a zero-waste policy.

agents.name: real_time_dashboard_agent
agents.role: Creates a digital dashboard for real-time tracking of energy and waste metrics during the conference.

agents.name: deal_negotiation_agent
agents.role: Negotiates sponsorship deals while ensuring partnerships align with sustainability objectives.

agents.name: sustainable_energy_evaluation_agent
agents.role: Evaluates venue energy solutions, focusing on renewable sources and minimizing carbon output.

agents.name: electric_vehicle_logistics_agent
agents.role: Oversees logistics and operations of electric vehicles, including autonomous shuttles for the event.

agents.name: plant_based_cuisine_specialist_agent
agents.role: Designs plant-based meal options to promote sustainable catering.

agents.name: energy_and_waste_tracker_agent
agents.role: Monitors energy and waste, collecting data for live feedback and analysis.

agents.name: carbon_management_tool
agents.role: Tool for analyzing venue carbon footprints and suggesting reduction strategies.

agents.name: budget_analysis_tool
agents.role: Analyzes and projects budgetary constraints in light of sustainability factors.

agents.name: menu_design_agent
agents.role: Customizes conference menus to align with zero-waste and plant-based standards.

agents.name: analytics_reports_agent
agents.role: Compiles data on energy and waste into actionable insights.

agents.name: charging_infrastructure_agent
agents.role: Coordinates charging station installation and maintenance for electric vehicles.

agents.name: attendee_services_agent
agents.role: Provides logistical and accommodation services for international delegates.

agents.name: accommodation_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Secures eco-certified accommodations for delegates.

agents.name: eco_certified_hotel_agent
agents.role: Identifies and coordinates with eco-certified hotels to provide sustainable lodging.

agents.name: feedback_collection_agent
agents.role: Facilitates feedback collection to evaluate attendee satisfaction and areas for improvement.

agents.name: green_tech_site_coordination_agent
agents.role: Coordinates field visits to local green technology sites and manages logistics for these excursions.

agents.name: field_trip_logistics_agent
agents.role: Manages the logistical aspects of field trips, including transportation and scheduling.

agents.name: site_performance_evaluation_agent
agents.role: Evaluates the performance and impact of the green technology sites visited during the field trips.

agents.name: budget_financial_summary_agent
agents.role: Provides comprehensive financial summaries based on analyzed budget data.

tools.name: carbon_management_tool
tools.description: Analyzes venue carbon footprints and provides strategies to mitigate it.

venue_features.description: List of venue's energy features with carbon impact ratings.

carbon_rating.description: Carbon impact rating of the feature.

event_duration.description: Duration of the event in days.

tools.name: budget_analysis_tool
tools.description: Analyzes and projects budgetary constraints in light of sustainability factors.

current_budget.description: Current allocated budget for the conference.

sponsorship_sources.description: Array of potential sponsorships and their estimated contributions.

contribution_value.description: Estimated monetary contribution from the sponsor.

sustainability_programs_cost.description: Estimated cost of implementing sustainability programs.
